sections.text: Terms, defined.As used in the Transit Authority Law, unless the context otherwise requires:(1) Authority means any transit authority created under the Transit Authority Law;(2) Board means the board of directors of any transit authority created under the Transit Authority Law;(3) City of the metropolitan class means all cities in the State of Nebraska defined to be cities of the metropolitan class by section 14-101;(4) Municipality and municipal means any city of the metropolitan class in the State of Nebraska; and(5) Bonds means revenue bonds of any transit authority established under the Transit Authority Law.SourceLaws 1957, c. 23, ยง 2, p. 158;Laws 1972, LB 1275, ยง 2;Laws 1998, LB 1191, ยง 6.
